Summary: Rectangular UFO Grayish/Black sighted between Hutto, Tx and Taylor, tx
divs: sighting detailsufo !!!! a rectangular ufo was sighted by me near hutto, texas at 11:30 am today by terry lee cochran it was very large and perfectly rectangular, grayish \ black in color hovering below the storm clouds like a huge banner. i was driving toward taylor, texas on hi-way 79 going east. it was the size of a football field in my opinion. moving as fast as i was driving at 55 miles per hour going parallel to it.. i watched it for almost 5 minutes in disbelief. then i took action and took the very next road to intersect with it and it just disappeared! this is the 2nd ufo that i have seen in my life time. the other was in 1973 and it was hovering over the decker lake power plant near austin, texas. what a sight seeing it going zig zag across the sky then stopping for abpout 5 minutes to recharge then off it went at a blink of an eye it was gone. my wife nancy witness it with me too and went to get a camera and it was gone.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around October 13th 2012
